| I am an associate professor in the Department of Economics at McMaster University. My academic interests are in theoretical and applied microeconometrics. For more information about my research, check out [my CV](./CV/CV_ChrisMuris.pdf), my [Google scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=zh8YkR8AAAAJ&hl=en) page, or the website maintained by [McMaster](https://socialsciences.mcmaster.ca/people/muris-chris). You can reach me at [muerisc@mcmaster.ca](mailto:muerisc@mcmaster.ca). | ![Chris](./chrissmall.jpg) |
